title: "Rock" squooshed serif caps
content:
I appreciate any help, thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007183027im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/rock_3898.jpg)

 [‹ (x) SwissLife logo - ITC Legacy Serif {Satya}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007183027/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37422 "Go to previous forum topic") [any fonts like this rough ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007183027/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37552 "Go to next forum topic")
author: stealyourboognish

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007183027im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/CG_Garamond_sqooshed_4221.png)
  
I dunno... could be based on a very badly abused sqooshed version of Garamond or Garamont.  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007183027im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/CG_Garamond_6238.png)
  
I took a screen grab of [CG Garamond](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007183027/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/at-garamond/) and sqooshed it, blurred it and reversed it.  
I feel so ashamed.
